short_summary: Programmer Analyst Services for Support of MariTime\u00ae
description: The Canadian Coast Guard (CCG) requires the services of an intermediate (Level 2) Programmer Analyst and a senior (Level 3) Programmer Analyst in order to support the CCG\u2019s HR system for seagoing personnel, MariTime\u00ae, an application developed in-house.
duration_in_months: Irrevocable option to extend by up to two (2) one-year periods under the same conditions
